FuncDef: This command configures the keys for identification of the DHCPv6 lease being held in the lease-database (for configured period after lease timeout). Subscriber requesting a lease via DHCPv6 that matches an existing lease based on this configured key is handed the matched prefix or address. This allows address and prefix "stickiness" for DHCPv6 assigned prefixes (IA_NA or PD).

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the user identification method. Values-duid - Specifies the IPv6 DHCP unique identifier from DHCPv6..
